title: Patcher not launching login screen?
body: I keep clicking launch from the patcher screen, but it doesn't launch the screen so I can login to the game

replies.body:
Most commonly, this is a result of an issue with the patcher itself or possibly a type of corruption.  Essentially, the patcher is supposed to tell the login screen to appear, but this command never happens, so it never actually appears.  In order to resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).  

Give me a reply back if it doesn't seem to help!
